translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで人生終了ですよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's where life ends!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: は、はぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: H-Huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかく帰れ。写真ではなく実物が相手してやると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, go home. Tell your daughter that I'll deal with her in person, not just in pictures.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 娘には伝えておけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make sure to tell your daughter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くっ……やましいことはしませんな！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kuh... I'm not going to do anything shady, alright?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分別ある大人だもんね！？　総統だもんね！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm a sensible adult, aren't I?! I'm the commander, right?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫だ大丈夫。嫌がるようなことはせん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's okay, it's okay. I won't do anything she'll dislike.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嘘偽りなく伝えろよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tell her that truthfully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫です……そんな事をして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's fine... because if I were to do something like that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレたら恐ろしいですから…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'd be in serious trouble if I got caught...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前、家庭内の地位、低そうだな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You seem to have a low status in your family...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふ。総統もいずれこうなりますよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph. The commander will end up like this someday too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 娘が長じれば、父親など……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the daughter grows up, her father is just...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、しかしそのうち愉悦に変わりますがね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, but eventually it turns into pleasure, though.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やかましい、帰れ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shut up, go home!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: というか、その顔をやめろ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or rather, stop making that face!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まったく、気色悪い……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seriously, that's disgusting...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 娘さんが大事なんですね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You really care about your daughter, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カケラも理解できん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't understand that at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 娘じゃセックスできんではないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can't have sex with your daughter, can you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （いや、ランスも親馬鹿の資質が…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (No, Rance also has the qualities of a doting parent...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: というか、既にそうなりかけてると思うけど……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or rather, I think he's already starting to become one...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっと……いかんいかん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oops... no, no.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 帰る前にスイーツを買っていかねば……ふふふ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have to buy some sweets before going home... hehe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビヨンホウは嬉しそうだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biyonhou looked happy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おや……総統閣下
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh... Commander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: …………なんだお前
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...What do you want?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城の中から届く薄明かりだけを照明にして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Using only the dim light coming from inside the castle as illumination,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビヨンホウがベンチで静かに酒を飲んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biyonhou was quietly drinking sake on a bench.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ……今日は、そういう気分でして。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No... today, I felt like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軽く酒でも嗜むか……と。いかがですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just enjoying a light drink... How about you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 馬鹿言いやがれ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't be ridiculous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男と差し向かいで酒なんぞ飲めるか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't drink alcohol face to face with another man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビヨンホウが差し出した予備のコップを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without even looking at the spare cup Biyonhou offered,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見ることもなく、ランスは鼻を鳴らした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance snorted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ……下戸でしたか、総統閣下は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... so you're a lightweight drinker, Commander...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは失礼。いい酒なのですがね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My apologies. It's good sake, you know...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだと？　そんな事ぁー言ってない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What? I never said that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふん、酒なんぞ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, alcohol or whatever...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビヨンホウのコップではなく酒瓶を奪い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Grabbing the sake bottle instead of Biyonhou's cup,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは中身を一気に流し込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance poured down the contents in one go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: んぐっ、ごぐっ、ぐびびっ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ngh, gulp, glug glug...
Commander...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひっく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前も。呑め
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You too. Drink.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お気に召しましたか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you like it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱暴に突きつけられる酒瓶の口に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To the mouth of the sake bottle thrust roughly,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: んぐっ、ごぐっ、ぐびびっ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ngh, gulp, glug glug...
Commander...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひっく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前も。呑め
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You too. Drink.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お気に召しましたか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you like it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱暴に突きつけられる酒瓶の口に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To the mouth of the sake bottle thrust roughly,
